pullRequest.title: AuthZ integration with TES
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
Integration of auth with TES. Only authenticated components are allowed to access AWS credentials.
Why is this change necessary:
This is for parity with v1. Without this change, an adversary who knows the tes URL can get credentials by sending an http request.
How was this change tested:
UT and integration test
Any additional information or context required to review the change:
This is same as PR #329. Previous PR was failing to merge from mainline as there were lot of conflicts in tests. I decided to rewrite them again.
Checklist:

 Updated the README if applicable
 Updated or added new unit tests
 Updated or added new integration tests
 Updated or added new end-to-end tests

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.
